name: Boogers (All the good names were taken)
description: You start off aboard your UAC Marine transport. Out of a crew of 4, 2 have already gone down to the surface and failed to report in at the predetermined time. You third crewmate has just left the brigde when the ship suddenly goes on Red Alert. You try to hail him, but you can't. You fear he's dead. Somehow the Hell-Spawn have boarded the ship.
